title: Activity Theory-Based Science Learning Game Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Learners are working professionals (administrative/managerial) who independently design and evaluate learning games using personal devices

learning_goals: Using the Learning Game Design Framework (ATMSG), derive three or more science problem-solving game mechanics.
Identify and apply five or more gamification elements that support self-directed learning.
Improve the learning effectiveness of a game prototype by 80% or more by incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
